goals__remit: The EU Mancozeb Task Force is a joint activity of UPL Europe Ltd and Indofil Industries Ltd as notifiers of the active substance Mancozeb. Our mission is to provide comprehensive and science-based information on Mancozeb and its application. The EU Mancozeb Taskforce is committed to undertake the development of relevant studies and trials to meet the requirements set out in relevant legislations on pesticides. Mancozeb manufacturers work towards the continuous improvement of the application methods.
